original_definition: 'point of sale' means a location where air conditioners are displayed or offered for sale, hire or hire-purchase.
generated_definition: 'point of sale' means the location where a product is sold to a consumer, typically a retail store or online marketplace.

Article 4: air conditioners, at the point of sale, bear the label provided by suppliers in accordance with Article 3(1) on the outside of the front or top of the appliance, in such a way as to be clearly visible;
